FROM `brand` brand LEFT JOIN `product_category_brand` ON id = brands_id WHERE product_categories_id = #{attributeValue} ORDER BY orders ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO brand( id , created_date , version , orders , logo , `name` , `type` , url , introduction ) VALUES ( #{entity.id}, #{entity.createdDate}, #{entity.version}, #{entity.order}, #{entity.logo}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.url}, #{entity.introduction} )
